hero.name: I am Yatharth
hero.subtitle: Innovating AI for smarter solutions and scalable systems.

about.title: About Me
about.primary: I'm a passionate software engineer and machine learning enthusiast, focused on building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.
about.secondary: With a background in computer science and years of industry experience, I blend technical expertise with creative problem-solving to deliver innovative solutions.

projects.title: Image Inpainting
projects.description: Harnessing segmentation-aware partial convolutions for ultra-precise image reconstruction.

projects.title: Inpersona
projects.description: AI-powered avatar, to inpersonate as if you are talking to me in person.

projects.title: Sprechen
projects.description: Implementing Transformer-based architecture to convert text between languages with precision.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? I'd love to hear from you!

items.title: SIH 2022 Grand Finale Winner
items.description: Led the creation of a no-code chatbot-building platform at the SIH hackathon, competing among thousands of teams. Enhanced chatbot narrative understanding with AWS ECS, implemented Amazon S3 for conversational storage.

items.title: 4th Rank in India Academia Connect AI Hackathon
items.description: Created AI solutions for COVID-19 distancing, using YOLO for crowd monitoring and heat maps for sanitation planning.

items.title: 87th Rank in Amazon ML Challenge
items.description: Ranked 87th among 10,000+ in Amazon's ML Challenge by building a product categorization model using TF-IDF.

items.name: Yogesh Shinde
items.role: Sr. Project Manager, Tools and Automation
items.content: I am pleased to recommend Yatharth Kapadia for his contributions during his time at IDeaS. He distinguished himself not only through his technical expertise but also through his collaborative approach to teamwork. Yatharth consistently demonstrated thoughtfulness, a willingness to assist others, and a commitment to delivering high-quality work. He is the type of individual who makes a meaningful impact, and I am confident he will bring the same dedication and professionalism to his future endeavors.

items.name: Janak Agrawal
items.content:
I had the privilege of working with Yatharth at Outspeed, where he quickly became an invaluable member of our team. Yatharth is knowledgeable and meticulous in understanding and modeling machine learning problems. His eagerness to contribute was evident when he swiftly took on a complex project and provided a solution that significantly increased productivity within just one month of joining my team.

Yatharth's hands-on experience with machine learning and generative AI allows him to solve problems effectively and efficiently. He is never shy about sharing innovative ideas and consistently delivers elegant solutions. I am also impressed by his business acumen at such an early stage in his career.

Any AI and machine learning team would greatly benefit from Yatharth‚Äôs proficiency, adaptability, and problem-solving mindset. I highly recommend him for any opportunity that requires technical expertise and a commitment to excellence.

items.name: Vignesh Charan
items.content: I've had the chance to work with Yatharth in several different settings, and he's consistently impressed me. We first collaborated on a research project tackling 3D image reconstruction with multiple GANs architectures - not an easy problem, but he had this knack for breaking it down into manageable parts when the rest of us were getting stuck. We later teamed up for a hackathon where his quick thinking saved us countless hours. Most recently, we were colleagues at Quidich Innovation Labs, where I got to see his work ethic day-to-day. What stands out about Yatharth isn't just his technical skills but he takes an extra mile to make things better - whether it's streamlining a workflow or pushing a project to the next level. Great teammate, sharp mind, and someone I'd gladly work with again.
